name: UpdateWebExperiment
description:
Update web experiment details within a project.

Use this tool to update specific details of a web experiment in a given project on Datadog. It tracks changes and logs views for the resource.

parameters.name: web_experiment_id
parameters.description: A unique integer identifying this web experiment to be updated.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access. Retrieve this ID via the `/api/projects/` endpoint.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: experiment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the web experiment to update. Must be an integer.

parameters.name: experiment_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the web experiment to update. This is used to identify the experiment for modification within the project.

parameters.name: feature_flag_key
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the feature flag associated with the web experiment.

parameters.name: web_experiment_variants
parameters.description: JSON string specifying variants for the web experiment. Include control, transforms, conditions, and rollout_percentage.

parameters.name: creation_timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp indicating when the web experiment was created. It should be in ISO 8601 format.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this web experiment.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this web experiment.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: variants
